defaultMessage: Get paid by contributing with Open Source
Contribute with Open Source projects and receive rewards in bounties
Work with on-demand projects as a freelancer using a development workflow
We use a Git Workflow to facilitate the process of delivery tasks on demand
Contribute with projects, get paid, receive tailored feedbacks and get your code into production
We use a very effective agile process to delivery tasks using Git, and we provide support to learn and improve your skills
Maintainers of Open Source projects can use Gitpay to outsource the development
Import issues from Git, add bounties, then pay contributors when the the related Pull Request is merged
Organizations can use Gitpay to develop tasks on demand, using a development workflow
Pay for on-demand freelancer work using an integrated workflow and get issues from your project solved
Funding your Open Source project
You can crowdfunding your Open Source projects on Gitpay, and get funding by inviting sponsor to add bounties
Import an issue from a Git repository
Import an issue to be solved, then you can set deadlines, add bounties and we will send to our community
Contributors and freelancers can apply to solve your issue
The users can send offers and the ones who applied can be assigned to complete the work
When the solution is ready, you can review, and once approved, you can merge and send the payment to the peer
An easy way to have your work integrated with development tools approved by the development community
Your issue was solved, and the contributor received the payment
We support payments with Credit Card or Paypal and the bounties are transfered directly to your bank account
Create an account on Gitpay
When you create an account, you can setup payment methods to receive bounties, setup your preferences and explore tasks. You can receive issues funded according to your preferences
Solve issues
You can apply to solve issues and receive the payment for a bounty, or even apply for learning purposes, to improve your skills
Receive payments with direct transfer or Paypal
Once your changes are merged into the code base and the issue was solved, you will receive the payment in your bank account
Help to build Gitpay while develop your skills
We are an Open-Source project, and you can apply to solve our bounties, we support you to solve our features, and we usually support contributors with fair bounties
A place for opportunities
You may become one of our top talents and there is chances that you can be hired by partner companies
A great workflow that helps you to focus in what matter
We follow git good practices to automate your delivery using git, and now you can work with tools you love and you will be supported with collaboration to solve issues
Import git issues to Gitpay
Import issues from your Github or Bitbucket projects using git to be able to add bounties and manage fundings, and set deadlines and workflows for payments
Assign contributors to solve
Contributors can apply for interest and make offers and you can approve their offers to solve your issues
Receive a change proposal using Pull Requests
The change request will be send directly to your approval, and once approved, the change is merged and the payment will be send to the peer
For any company
The distributed colaboration helps company grows and provide a great solution to have the tasks solved using agile process and colaboration throught development
Companies will be able to use Open Source if they want to create colaborative tools that will help other companies and contribute with the OSS ecosystem
We validate your business integration process
We will help to fit in agile process to have your tasks concluded in an independent way and according to your business
Sponsor Gitpay
You can help to leverage open source by sponsoring Gitpay and our developers, and you will be featured in our platform
Sponsor any of our projects
You can sponsor projects you like to growth open source and increase the colaboration in projects with issues to be solved
We share your brand to our community
As a crowdfunding platform, you can sponsor us and you will have your brand featured in our weekly newsletter
Use of personal information
The company may use personal information for the following purposes: login and signup for Gitpay service, email notifications when enabled, and statitic data when authorized
Integration with third party
We never provide access to your data to a third party without your previous consent
Use of Cookies
We use cookies to help to improve your experience with Gitpay, providing a custom experience according with your needs
Terms

THIS IS A LEGALLY BINDING AGREEMENT between you and Work n Enjoy Inc., former company of Gitpay. If you are entering into this Agreement on behalf of a company or other legal entity, you represent that you have the authority to bind such entity to these terms and conditions, in which case the terms "you" or "your" shall refer to such entity. If you do not have such authority, or if you do not agree with these terms and conditions, you must not proceed with the registration process or use our Site or Service.
By developers, for developers
We use tools like Git, and integrations with Github and Gitlab to automate the freelancer proccess
We are fully Open Source
We are a open source project made by contributors, and we help our community of contributors to shift their careers to the the next level
Collaborate from anywhere, empowering development communities
We use collaborative remote tools like Slack and discuss and review code on Github or Bitbucket, and we do payments for bounties and freelancer work worldwide
